tool_description: Retrieves calendar events and availability data for specified participants within a given time range, supporting multiple calendar platforms.

calendar_platform.description: Calendar platform: google, outlook, exchange, or caldav

error_messages: Invalid date range: start_date must be before end_date and both must be valid ISO 8601 timestamps.
Authentication failed: Unable to access calendar data for one or more participants. Check permissions and credentials.
Unsupported calendar platform: Use one of [google, outlook, exchange, caldav].
Participant limit exceeded: Maximum 50 participants allowed per request.
Invalid email format: One or more participant emails are not properly formatted.
usage: Provide participant_emails array, start_date, and end_date. Optionally specify calendar_platform. Returns calendar events and busy/free status for all participants in the specified time range.

events.description: Array of event descriptions with timestamps and participant info

busy_periods.description: Array of busy time periods for each participant

calendar_platform_used.description: The calendar platform that was accessed
